content.text: Samurai Batts was one of the visitors on Kyuka Island. He is seen with a surfboard. His name was revealed in the Blue databook.
He is a middle-aged man with dark hair. He has light purple swim shorts with dark purple polka dots. He also has a tattoo on both arms.
He presumably likes surfing, as he was seen carrying a blue and magenta surfboard with him.
He was seen on Kyuka Island while Mr. 3 and Miss Goldenweek talked about their plan.
When Miss Goldenweek, Mr.5, and Miss Valentine infiltrated Kyuka Island to release their comrades, Samurai Batts was seen still vacationing.
